displayName: Istio Proxy - Prometheus - High Request Duration

documentation.content: When the request duration is high, it indicates performance issues with deployed Envoy proxies, network issues, or slow application response times.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch prometheus_target
| metric
    'prometheus.googleapis.com/istio_request_duration_milliseconds/histogram'
| percentile_from(95)
| cast_units('ms')
| every 5m
| window 5m
| condition val() > 500 'ms'
